difficulty.title: Are The Deacons of the Deep Supposed to Be Easy? : r/darksouls3 - Reddit
difficulty.body: Come back to them at like NG+6 and it's a different story. I feel like their difficulty spikes when you start getting into the NG+5 and up just because it takes more than a few hits to kill each deacon and if you're not careful you can get surrounded and pounded pretty easily.
